gurmukhi: ਜੈਸੇ ਪਤਿਬ੍ਰਤਾ ਪਰ ਪੁਰਖੈ ਨ ਦੇਖਿਓ ਚਾਹੈ ਪੂਰਨ ਪਤਿਬ੍ਰਤਾ ਕੈ ਪਤਿ ਹੀ ਕੈ ਧਿਅਾਨ ਹੈ
transliteration: Jaisay Patibrataa Par Purakhai N Daykhiao Chaahai , Pooran Patibrataa Kai Pati Hee Kai Dhiaan Hai ?
translation: Just as a faithful wife does not like to look at another man and being sincere and faithful always supports her husband in her mind.

gurmukhi: ਸਰ ਸਰਿਤਾ ਸਮੁੰਦ੍ਰ ਚਾਤ੍ਰਿਕ ਨ ਚਾਹੈ ਕਾਹੂ ਅਾਸ ਘਨ ਬੂੰਦ ਪ੍ਰਿਅ ਪ੍ਰਿਅ ਗੁਨ ਗਿਅਾਨ ਹੈ
transliteration: Sar Saritaa Samoundr Chaatrik N Chaahai Kaahoo , Aas Ghan Boond Pria Pria Goun Giaan Hai ?
translation: Just as a rain-bird does not want water from a lake river or sea, but keeps on wailing for Swati drop from the clouds.

gurmukhi: ਦਿਨਕਰ ਓਰ ਭੋਰ ਚਾਹਤ ਨਹੀ ਚਕੋਰ ਮਨ ਬਚ ਕ੍ਰਮ ਹਿਮਕਰ ਪ੍ਰਿਅ ਪ੍ਰਾਨ ਹੈ
transliteration: Dinakar Aor Bhor Chaahat Nahee Chakora , Man Bach Kram Himakar Pria Praan Hai ?
translation: Just as a Ruddy sheldrake does not like to look at the Sun even when the Sun is rising because the moon is his beloved in all respects.

gurmukhi: ਤੈਸੇ ਗੁਰਸਿਖ ਅਾਨ ਦੇਵ ਸੇਵ ਰਹਤਿ ਪੈ ਸਹਜ ਸੁਭਾਵ ਨ ਅਵਗਿਅਾ ਅਭਮਾਨੁ ਹੈ ||੪੬੬||
transliteration: Taisay Gursikh Aan Dayv Sayv Rahati Pai , Sahaj Soubhaav N Avagiaa Abhamaanu Hai ?466?
translation: So is a devoted disciple of the True Guru who does not worship any other god or goddess except the dearer than his life-True Guru. But, by remaining in a state of tranquility, he neither disrespects anyone nor shows the arrogance of his supremacy.  (466)
